wikipedia_page.main: Peter Little (born 26 December 1933) is a British modern pentathlete. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics in the modern pentathlon, finishing 26th individually and 7th in the team standings.

response: Peter Little (December 11, 1775 – February 5, 1830) was a U.S. Representative from Maryland.
